# init(playerItem:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new player to play the specified player item.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated init(playerItem item: AVPlayerItem?)
```

## Parameters

- **item**: The player item to play.

## Return Value

A new player initialized to play `item`.

## Creating a player

- **init(url:)**: Creates a new player to play a single audiovisual resource referenced by a given URL.
- **init()**: Creates a player object.
